section.p: You make your way down a long tunnel to a hall which is lit bya thousand white candles and lined with tables. Here you are greeted by men and women who are clad in shrouds that they wear like togas; their faces are pale as marble, their eyes like dull grey jewels.
There is a presence in the deep darkness at the distant end of the hall. ‘Who goes there?’ booms a voice that fills you with awe.

If you have the title Chosen One of Nagil, .
If not but you are an initiate of Nagil, .
